extension.name: Content - Responsive Slideshare
extension.author: ColorPack Creations Co., Ltd.
extension.copyright: ColorPack Creations Co., Ltd. 2013. All rights reserved.
extension.description:
With this plugin, you can embed Slideshare into articles simply by copying and pasting a Slideshare ID between the slideshare flags: {slideshare}xxxxxx{/slideshare}. use Slideshare ID if 14167122

Then you would insert the following text to your article:
{slideshare}14167122{/slideshare}

field.name: width
field.label: Width
field.description: Width of the Slideshare. Default width is 640 pixels.

field.name: height
field.label: Height
field.description: Height of the Slideshare. Default height is 360 pixels.
